TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Langas, title = Langas, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Langas} }

S.FORM: = Langas = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Jweysweysyang ka alang Langas. 136 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 342 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 89% niqan 304 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 11% niqan 38 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 68%, Bunun 18%, Paiwan 1%, Truku 1%, ni rahuq na o 1%. Pnyahan pnatas

= Langas = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Jweysweysyang ka alang Langas. 136 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 342 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 89% niqan 304 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 11% niqan 38 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 68%, Bonon 18%, Paiwan 1%, Troko 1%, ni rahoq na o 1%. Pnyahan pnatas
